price: Mu vy’ukuri abarongoye abandi, baramaze guhubisha ba nyarucari benshi. Kubera ivyo rero Mana! Ndagusavye ntiwongerereze abirenganije mu kukugarariza, kiretse ubuhuvyi n’agahombo ku kandi".
arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا

meta.transliteration: waqad aḍallū kathīran walā tazidi al-ẓālimīna illā ḍalālan
